content:
Items recommended: Weight-reducing clothing, stamina potions, summer pies, 8 empty inventory slots.

Note: It is recommended to charge your teleport crystals now if you're running low, since the area becomes instanced later on and you cannot do this until much later.

Talk to Lord Ieuan Amlodd to be transported into the Grand Library.( 1)…

1Yes.

If you log out inside, you will be kicked out but your progress will be saved.

The Seal of the Forgotten[edit | edit source]

The location of the Seal of the Forgotten.
  • Touch the Seal of the Forgotten as indicated by the map.

The Seal of Ithell[edit | edit source]

  • Head to the south-east room directly east of the entrance.
  • Rotate the mirrors to reflect light to the end of the puzzle. Solution shown here:

  • Investigate the Seal of Ithell on the east side of the room. Talk to the memory to get teleported to the centre.( 1)…
    1Yes please.

The Seal of Cadarn[edit | edit source]

Solution for unlocking Cadarn's seal.
  • Return to the centre room.
  • Collect the seven hand mirrors (these stack) and red crystal from the Crystal Dispenser.( 3)…
    3Take everything.
  • Go to Mirror #1 as indicated on the map and use a mirror on the pillar, making the light reflect east.
  • Mirror #2 points down. (The base of the pillar lights up.)
  • Use the stairs to go to the bottom floor.
  • Mirror #3 points south.
  • The light automatically changes to blue.
  • Mirror #4 points west.
  • Mirror #5 points south.
  • Place the Red crystal. The light turns magenta.
  • Mirror #6 points east.
  • Mirror #7 points south.
  • Touch the Seal of Cadarn. Talk to the memory to get teleported to the centre.( 1)…
    1Yes please.

The Seal of Crwys[edit | edit source]

Solution for unlocking Crwys's seal.
  • Return to the centre room.
  • Pull the lever on the crystal dispenser then collect the ten hand mirrors and four crystals from the crystal dispenser.( 4•1•3)…
    4Pull the lever.
    1Pull it.
    3Take everything
  • Mirror #1 points west.
  • Mirror #2 points north.
  • Mirror #3 points west.
  • Place the fractured crystal on the pillar between Mirrors #3 and #4.
  • Mirror #4 points north.
  • Place the Green crystal, turning the light white.
  • Run around to get past the gap.
  • Mirror #5 points down.
  • Take the stairs to go down to the bottom floor.
  • Mirror #6 points east.
  • Mirror #7 points up.
  • Take the stairs to go up to the middle floor.
  • Place the Cyan crystal.
  • Take the stairs to go up to the top floor.
  • Mirror #8 points south.
  • Mirror #9 points down.
  • Take the stairs down to the middle floor.
  • Mirror #10 points south.
  • Interact with the Seal of Crwys south of Mirror #10. Talk to the memory to get teleported to the centre.( 1)…
    1Yes please.

  • Mirror #2 points east.
  • Mirror #3 points north.
  • Mirror #4 points west.
  • Mirror #5 points down.
  • Take the stairs down to the bottom floor.
  • Mirror #6 points south.
  • Go back to the beginning on the middle floor where you put the Fractured crystal.
  • Mirror #7 points east.
  • Mirror #8 points down.
  • Take the stairs down to the bottom floor.
  • Mirror #9 points south.
  • Mirror #10 points west.
  • Mirror #11 points south.
  • Mirror #12 points west.
  • Mirror #13 points north.
  • Place the Green crystal, turning the light cyan.
  • Run around via the centre part of the map to cross the gap.
  • Place the Yellow crystal, turning the light green.
  • Mirror #14 points east.
  • Mirror #15 points east.
  • Mirror #16 points south.
  • Interact with the Seal of Amlodd. Talk to the memory to get teleported to the centre.( 1)…
